# Subtis - DB

## Schema

[Supabase Schema](https://supabase-schema.vercel.app/#)

## Indexes

- Subtitles
  - bytes
  - title_id
  - title_file_name

- Titles
  - title_name
  - year

## Functions

```sql
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.fuzzy_search_title(query text)
RETURNS TABLE (id int8, title_name text, year int8, type text, backdrop text) AS $$
BEGIN
    RETURN QUERY
    SELECT t.id, t.title_name, t.year, t.type, t.backdrop
    FROM "Titles" t
    WHERE (query % ANY(STRING_TO_ARRAY(t.title_name, ' '))
       OR query % ANY(STRING_TO_ARRAY(t.title_name_spa, ' ')));
END;
$$ LANGUAGE plpgsql;
```


```sql
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION update_subtitles_info(_title_id text)
RETURNS void AS $$
BEGIN
    UPDATE "Subtitles"
    SET lastQueriedAt = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
        queriedTimes = queriedTimes + 1
    WHERE "title_id" = _title_id;
END;
$$ LANGUAGE plpgsql;
```
